title: #92Noon! Courtney Cronin/Mike Florio/Aaron Gleeman
description: ESPN journalist, Courtney Cronin, starts the show offf with PA continuing a conversation on the Vikings recent social justice efforts.  Mike Florio calls in for his weekly segment on the NFL.  Plus, Aaron Gleeman joins PA in studio to talk about the Twins and debate the funkiness of Hanson's timeless classic "MMMBop"
itunes:summary: ESPN journalist, Courtney Cronin, starts the show offf with PA continuing a conversation on the Vikings recent social justice efforts.  Mike Florio calls in for his weekly segment on the NFL.  Plus, Aaron Gleeman joins PA in studio to talk about the Twins and debate the funkiness of Hanson's timeless classic "MMMBop"
